about_the_game:
The Explorer of Light

The Tale of LUMI is a fast paced 2D action game. You play as Atlas in his quest to restore the fallen Kingdom of LUMI.

Collect GODLY POWERUPS, fight POWERFUL enemies, solve INTRIGUING puzzles, UPGRADE your arsenal and EXPLORE and RESTORE the fallen Kingdom of LUMI!

LUMI, the Fallen Kingdom


The ruined Kingdom of LUMI was once a powerful Kingdom. Keeping the connection between all worlds safe. Then the Nightbringers conjured the Total Eclipse. Bringing the primordial God Khaos from the eternal slumber. Khaos then brought the once powerful Kingdom down to ruins.

EXPLORE the now Fallen Kingdom and all it's secrets. Unlock the entire map by interacting with the POWERFUL entities that lie within.

KHAOS ZONES

Khaos Zones are areas in the Kingdom that have been taken by Khaos. Defeat the enemies, zone guardians and solve puzzles to restore the infected zones back to their original state!

Altas, the chosen hero

Godly Powerups, the gifts from Gods and Heroes


As you play the game you will be collecting GODLY POWERUPS. Those GODLY POWERUPS will grant you unique abilities to solve puzzles, navigate in the map and fight enemies.




UPGRADE
Upgrades are essential as Atlas travels deeper through LUMI. UPGRADE your GODLY POWERUPS to level up your gameplay and face the challenges brought by the Nightbringers and Khaos!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: MacOS Ventura 13.4.1
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro
  • Memory: 3 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires an Apple processor
  • OS: MacOS Ventura 13.4.1
  • Processor: Apple M1 Pro
  • Memory: 6 MB RAM
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

name: The Tale of LUMI

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: 2.5 GHz Intel Core i3 processor
  • Memory: 3 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Graphics Card with 1GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 11
  • Processor: 3.2 GHz Intel Core i5 processor
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11 Graphics Card with 2GB VRAM
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space

short_description: The Tale of LUMI is a fast paced, metroidvania inspired, action game. Collect powers from Gods and Heroes. Upgrade your Skills. Defeat unyielding enemies. Explore LUMI and unveil the secrets that lie within this puzzling Kingdom.
supported_languages:
English*, Portuguese - Brazil
*languages with full audio support
